item.title: An overview of great tools for data science
item.description: Travel vector designed by Freepik This post presents an overview of the most useful tools for data science-related tasks. It is not meant to be a complete list, but rather a brief summary of the tools I’ve found repeatedly useful, with a couple new ones that show great promise. The idea came from my last project (Exploration of Texas Death row data), where I ended up using quite a lot of Python packages, without having planned it from the start.
